short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helpful functions when working with IMEI numbers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Development tools to help when working with IMEI numbers. Select an input on any website and right click to get the context menu to generate and insert an IMEI number. You can also select text and us the context menu to confirm if it is a valid format IMEI number. A notification will pop up to let you know if it is valid or not.

If this sees use, I plan to add more IMEI related tools to this extension in the future such as bulk validation.
